reason: 하녀 learns if  수학자 wakes tonight or not, even though  하녀 wakes first.
이야기꾼 cannot gain  사악한 쌍둥이 ability if 전염병 의사 dies.
If  식인종 gains  집사 ability,  식인종 learns this.
If  저글러 guesses on ir first day and dies by 처형, tonight  living 식인종 learns how many guesses  저글러 got correct.
If  식인종 gains  광신도 ability,  식인종 learns this.
수학자 learns if  미치광이 attacks a different 플레이어(s) than  real 악마 attacked.
A 피트해그 can not create a 이교도.
If a 피트해그 creates a 아가씨,  이야기꾼 chooses which 플레이어 it is.
A 피트해그 can not create an evil 정치가.
If re is a spare token,  피트해그 can create an extra 동네바보. If so,  주정뱅이 동네바보 might change.
If  피트해그 turns an evil 플레이어 into  교주, y can't turn good due to ir own ability.
If  피트해그 turns an evil 플레이어 into  깡패, y can't turn good due to ir own ability.
If  피트해그 turns an evil 플레이어 into  오우거, y can't turn good due to ir own ability.
세레노부스 may choose to make a 플레이어 mad that y are  고블린.
If 전염병의사 dies, a living 하수인 gains  고블린 ability in addition to ir own ability, and learns this.
If 레비아탄 nominates and executes  군인,  군인 does not die.
If 레비아탄 nominates and executes  플레이어  수도승 chose, that 플레이어 does not die.
If 레비아탄 nominates and executes a 플레이어  여관주인 chose, that 플레이어 does not die.
If 레비아탄 is in play &  레이븐키퍼 dies by 처형, y wake that night to use ir ability.
If 레비아탄 is in play, and  밴시 dies by 처형, all 플레이어s learn that  밴시 has died, and  밴시 gains ir ability.
If 레비아탄 is in play &  현자 dies by 처형, y wake that night to use ir ability.
If 레비아탄 is in play & a 농부 dies by 처형, a good 플레이어 becomes a 농부 that night.
If 레비아탄 is in play & no 처형 occurs on day 5, good wins.
If  모자장수 dies on or after day 5,  악마 cannot choose 레비아탄.
After day 5,  피트해그 cannot choose 레비아탄.
If  양귀비 재배자 is in play, 하수인들 don't wake toger. y are woken one by one, until one of m chooses to take 릴몬스타 token.
Each night,  마술사 chooses 하수인: if that 하수인 & 릴몬스타 are alive, that 하수인 babysits 릴몬스타
If re are 5 or more 플레이어s alive and  플레이어 holding  릴몬스타 token dies,  부정한 여자 is given  릴몬스타 token tonight.
Votes for  오르간 연주자 count if  오르간 연주자 is babysitting 릴몬스타
수상 can die by 처형 if y are babysitting 릴몬스타
If a 악마 chooses 릴몬스타, y also choose 하수인 to become and babysit 릴몬스타 tonight.
If  늑대인간 is alive and  도박꾼 kills mself at night, no or 플레이어s can die tonight.
군단 and  엔지니어 can not both be in play at  start of  game. If  엔지니어 creates 군단, most 플레이어s (including all evil 플레이어s) become evil 군단.
If  전도사 chooses 군단, 군단 keeps ir ability, but  전도사 might learn y are 군단.
If 군단 died by 처형 today, 군단 keeps ir ability, but  음유시인 might learn y are 군단.
If  모자장수 dies and 군단 is in play, nothing happens. If  모자장수 dies and an evil 플레이어 chooses 군단, all current evil 플레이어s become 군단.
광신도 might register as evil to 군단’s ability.
If 팡구 chooses an 이방인 and dies,  부정한 여자 does not become 팡구
연금술사 can not have  스파이 ability.
When  스파이 sees  Grimoire,  악마 and 마술사's 캐릭터 tokens are removed.
If  양귀비 재배자 is in play,  스파이 does not see  Grimoire until  양귀비 재배자 dies.
If 전염병 의사 dies, a living 하수인 gains  스파이 ability in addition to ir own ability, and learns this.
If  스파이 is (or has been) in play,  아가씨 is poisoned
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
스파이 registers as evil to  오우거.
연금술사 can not have  마녀 ability.
When  마녀 sees  Grimoire,  악마 and 마술사's 캐릭터 tokens are removed.
If  양귀비 재배자 is in play,  마녀 does not see  Grimoire until  양귀비 재배자 dies.
If  마녀 is (or has been) in play,  아가씨 is poisoned.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
If 전염병 의사 dies, a living 하수인 gains  부정한 여자 ability in addition to ir own ability, and learns this.
If 전염병 의사 is executed and  이야기꾼 would gain  봄버맨 ability,  봄버맨 ability triggers immediately.
If 전염병 의사 dies, a living 하수인 gains  공포조장자 ability in addition to ir own ability, and learns this.
If  엑소시스트 chooses  야가보블,  야가보블 ability does not kill tonight.
If  소환사 is in play,  시계공 does not receive ir information until a 악마 is created.
If re is an 연금술사-소환사 in play,  game starts with a 악마 in play, as normal. If  연금술사-소환사 chooses a 플레이어, y make that 플레이어 a 악마 but do not change ir alignment.
If  양귀비 재배자 is alive when  소환사 acts,  소환사 chooses which 악마, but  이야기꾼 chooses which 플레이어.
꼭두각시 neighbours  소환사.  소환사 knows who  꼭두각시 is.
소환사 cannot create an in-play 악마. If  소환사 creates a not-in-play 악마, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
소환사 cannot create an in-play 악마. If  소환사 creates a not-in-play 악마, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If  소환사 is 주정뱅이 on  3rd night,  소환사 chooses which 악마, but  이야기꾼 chooses which 플레이어.
If  엔지니어 removes a 소환사 from play before that 소환사 uses ir ability,  소환사 uses ir ability immediately.
If  소환사 turns a dead 플레이어 into  좀부울,  이야기꾼 treats that 플레이어 as a 좀부울 that has died once.
소환사 may choose a 플레이어 to become  푸카 on  2nd night.
If  소환사 creates 폭도, all 하수인들 become 폭도.
If  소환사 creates 군단, most 플레이어s (including all evil 플레이어s) become evil 군단.
소환사 cannot create an in-play 악마. If  소환사 creates a not-in-play 악마, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If  전도사 chose  소환사 on or before  3rd night,  소환사 chooses which 악마, but  이야기꾼 chooses which 플레이어.
If the Summoner creates a Lord of Typhon, the Lord of Typhon must neighbor a Minion. The other neighbor becomes a not-in-play evil Minion.
남작 might only add 1 이방인, not 2.
If  이야기꾼 gains  남작 ability, up to two 플레이어s become out-of-play 이방인s.
꼭두각시 neighbors 하수인, not  악마.  꼭두각시 is not woken to choose who takes  릴몬스타 token, and does not learn y are  꼭두각시 if y have  릴몬스타 token.
When  양귀비 재배자 dies,  악마 learns  꼭두각시 but  꼭두각시 learns nothing.
꼭두각시 does not learn 3 not in-play 캐릭터s.  악마 learns an extra 3 instead.
If  꼭두각시 thinks that y are   기구비행사, +1 이방인 was added.
꼭두각시 does not learn that a 아가씨 is in play.
If  악마 has a neighbour who is alive and a 마을주민 or 이방인 when 전염병 의사 dies, that 플레이어 becomes an evil 꼭두각시. If re is already an extra evil 플레이어, this does not happen.
If  꼭두각시 thinks that y are  헌츠맨,  아가씨 was added.
If  흑막 is alive and  리치's host dies by 처형,  리치 lives but loses ir ability.
If  슬레이어 slays  리치's host,  host dies.
If  리치 has poisoned  이교도 n  리치 dies,  이교도 remains poisoned
An evil 마을주민 is only created if  현상금 사냥꾼 is still in play after  카질리 acts.
If  카질리 chooses  깡패 to become 하수인, remaining 하수인 choices are decided by  이야기꾼.
If  카질리 chooses to create a 꼭두각시, y must choose one of ir neighbours.
If  카질리 chooses  아가씨 to become 하수인, and a 헌츠맨 is in play, a good 플레이어 becomes  아가씨.
카질리 can not choose  왕 to become 하수인 if a 성가대원 is in play.
If  카질리 turns  군인 into 하수인,  군인 chooses which not-in-play 하수인 to become.
폭도 and  엔지니어 can not both be in play at  start of  game. If  엔지니어 creates 폭도,  evil 플레이어s become 폭도.
If  골렘 nominates 폭도,  폭도 플레이어 does not die.
If  밀고자 is in play, each 폭도 플레이어 gets an extra 3 bluffs.
If a good 플레이어 nominates and kills  성자,  성자's team loses.
집사 can not nominate ir master.
If  피트해그 creates 폭도, all evil 플레이어s become 폭도. If  피트해그 creates 폭도 after day 3,  game continues for one more day.
If  3rd day begins with just three 플레이어s alive,  플레이어s may choose (as a group) not to nominate at all. If so (and a 시장 is alive) n  시장's team wins.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills  수도승-protected-플레이어,  수도승-protected-플레이어 does not die.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills a 농부,  농부 uses ir ability tonight.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates an 여관주인-protected-플레이어,  여관주인-protected-플레이어 does not die.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills a 현자,  현자 uses ir ability tonight.
If 폭도 nominates and kills  밴시, all 플레이어s learn that  밴시 has died, and  밴시 may nominate two 플레이어s immediately.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills  레이븐키퍼,  레이븐키퍼 uses ir ability tonight.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates  군인,  군인 does not die.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills  손주,  할머니 dies too.
If a 폭도 플레이어 nominates and kills  왕 and  성가대원 is alive,  성가대원 uses ir ability tonight.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
플레이어s that die by nomination register as being executed to  장의사.
플레이어s that die by nomination register as being executed to  식인종.
플레이어s that die by nomination register as being executed to  평화주의자.
플레이어s that die by nomination register as being executed to  악마의 변호사
폭도 registers as 하수인 to  조사관.
폭도 registers as 하수인 to  시계공.
폭도 registers as 하수인 to  포고꾼
폭도 registers as 하수인 to  아가씨.
폭도 registers as 하수인 to  전도사.
If  모자장수 dies, 폭도 is in play and a 폭도 chooses a different 악마, a normal evil team is created from  폭도 플레이어s. If  모자장수 dies and  악마 chooses 폭도, 하수인들 become 폭도 too.
If you are nominated, you must nominate again, even if dead.
If re are two living 알하디키아s,  부정한 여자 알하디키아 becomes  부정한 여자 again.
If  오르간 연주자 is causing eyes closed voting,  집사 may raise ir hand to vote but ir vote is only counted if ir master voted too.
If  음유시인 makes everyone 주정뱅이,  오르간 연주자 keeps ir ability but  음유시인 keeps ir eyes open when voting.
If  전도사 removes  오르간 연주자 ability,  오르간 연주자 keeps ir ability but  전도사 keeps ir eyes open when voting.
If  조사관 learns that  수상 is in play,  existence of  수상 is not announced by  이야기꾼.
If  수상 loses ir ability, y learn this and if  수상 is executed while y have ir ability, ir team wins.
If  수상 loses ir ability, y learn this and if  수상 is executed while y have ir ability, ir team wins.
If  연금술사 has  수상 ability, y may only choose to execute immediately if three or more 플레이어s voted.
Only 1 jinxed 캐릭터 can be in play.
수상 wakes with  공포조장자, learns who y choose and cannot choose to execute that 플레이어.
정치가 might register as evil to  수상.
If  수상 is in play,  알사히르 must also guess which 악마(s) are in play.
광신도 might register as evil to  수상.
If  볼텍스 is in play and  악마 kills  밴시,  플레이어s still learn that  밴시 has died.
If  은둔자 registers as evil to  오우거,  오우거 learns that y are evil.
If  철학자 gains  현상금 사냥꾼 ability, a 마을주민 might turn evil.
If  알하디키아 dies by 처형, and  흑막 is alive,  알하디키아 chooses 3 good 플레이어s tonight: if all 3 choose to live, evil wins. Orwise, good wins.
The Demon cannot have the Heretic ability.
If the Demon has the Cult Leader ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.
If the Demon has the Goon ability, they can’t turn good due to this ability.
The Demon cannot have the Ogre ability.
The Demon cannot have the Politician ability.
If the Demon would have the Drunk ability, the Boffin chooses a Townsfolk player to have this ability instead.
If the Alchemist has the Boffin ability, the Alchemist does not learn what ability the Demon has.
If there is a spare token, the Boffin can give the Demon the Village Idiot ability.
